## Model Construction

::: {.cell layout-align="TRUE"}

```{.r .cell-code}
#------------#
#----QDA-----#
#------------#
set.seed(1234)
train_control <- trainControl(method = "cv", number = 10)

set.seed(1234)
qda_model <- train(good ~ ., 
                   data = train, 
                   method = "qda", 
                   trControl = train_control)

save(qda_model, file = "dataset\\model\\qda.model_kfoldCV.Rdata")

#------------------#
#----QDA (Mod)-----#
#------------------#
```
:::


## K-fold CV

::: {.cell layout-align="TRUE"}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Data Import
load("dataset\\wine.data.Rdata")
load("dataset\\train.Rdata")
load("dataset\\test.Rdata")

# Model Import
load("dataset\\model\\qda.model_kfoldCV.Rdata")

qda.predictions <- predict(qda_model, newdata = test)

confusionMatrix(qda.predictions, test$good)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
qda.predictions <- as.numeric(qda.predictions)
pred_obj <- prediction(qda.predictions, test$good)
auc_val <- performance(pred_obj, "auc")@y.values[[1]]
auc_val
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.7548694
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
roc_obj <- performance(pred_obj, "tpr", "fpr")
plot(roc_obj, colorize = TRUE, lwd = 2,
     xlab = "False Positive Rate", 
     ylab = "True Positive Rate",
     main = "ROC Curves from Repeated CV")
points(auc_val, 1 - auc_val, 
       col = "steelblue", 
       pch = 21)
abline(a = 0, b = 1)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
qda.kfoldCV.ROC.plot <- recordPlot()
```
